languages.text: {n}Маражай со смехом отстраняется от вас.{/n} "Тогда не говори того, чего на самом деле не думаешь, {name}. Это... небезопасно для твоего вида".
{n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, {name}. It is dangerous for your kind."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай со смехом отстраняется от вас.{/n} "Тогда не говори того, чего на самом деле не думаешь, {name}. Это... небезопасно для твоего вида".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying what you are really thinking, {name}. That is dangerous for your kind."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying what you are really thinking, {name}. That is dangerous for your kind."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying what you are really thinking, {name}. That is dangerous for your kind."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, {name}. It is dangerous for your kind."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se aleja con una risita.{/n} «Pues deja de decir cosas si no van en serio, {name}. Es peligroso para tu gente».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, {name}. It is dangerous for your kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se aleja con una risita.{/n} «Pues deja de decir cosas si no van en serio, {name}. Es peligroso para tu gente».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋退了一步，轻笑起来。{/n}“既然如此，就别再说这种蠢话了，{name}。这对你们来说太危险了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, {name}. It is dangerous for your kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋退了一步，轻笑起来。{/n}“既然如此，就别再说这种蠢话了，{name}。这对你们来说太危险了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは笑いながら身を引く。{/n}「それなら、本意ではないことを口にするのはやめろ、{name}。お前の種族の危険を招くぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, {name}. It is dangerous for your kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは笑いながら身を引く。{/n}「それなら、本意ではないことを口にするのはやめろ、{name}。お前の種族の危険を招くぞ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'écarte avec un gloussement.{/n} « Entendu, à condition que vous cessiez de dire n'importe quoi, {name}. C'est un jeu dangereux, pour quelqu'un de votre espèce. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, {name}. It is dangerous for your kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'écarte avec un gloussement.{/n} « Entendu, à condition que vous cessiez de dire n'importe quoi, {name}. C'est un jeu dangereux, pour quelqu'un de votre espèce. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai weicht lachend zurück.{/n} "Dann hört auf, Dinge zu sagen, die Ihr nicht so meint, {name}. Das kann für Euresgleichen gefährlich sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, {name}. It is dangerous for your kind."

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, . It is dangerous for your kind."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kıkırdayarak geri çekiliyor.{/n} "O zaman niyetin olmayan şeyleri söylemeyeceksin {name}. Başına bela alırsın sonra."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pulls away with a chuckle.{/n} "Then stop saying things you do not mean, {name}. It is dangerous for your kind."
